title: Autumn Days
text:
The days grow colder and the nights grow longer.
Leaves change their colour — from green to gold, orange, and red.
The wind blows softly through the trees, making the branches sway.
Children play outside, kicking leaves high into the air.
Sometimes a cloud hides the pale sun, and rain begins to fall.
In the evening, families stay inside, drinking hot cocoa and telling stories by the fire.
Autumn is a time of change — a bright and cosy season before the snow.
